prompt: Create a modern admin dashboard with a light theme. Add a top navigation bar containing the app title 'Admin Panel', a user profile avatar, and a notification bell icon. Below, display four horizontal statistical cards: Total Users (1,247), Revenue (45,890), Orders (892), and Growth Rate (12.5%). Each card should have a unique background color (blue, green, orange, purple), bold white text, and soft shadows. Beneath the stats, include a 'Recent Activities' section with a vertical list of 5 activity items, each showing a circular avatar, description, and timestamp. Place a floating action button with a plus icon at the bottom right. Use rounded corners, spacing, and Material Design guidelines.
